list.name: Releases
list.query: SELECT title, description from annotations WHERE $timeFilter order by time asc

panels.description: Measures activity of companies users. Activity is defined as: creating issue, PR, commit, comment. Self means developers working on their own.
panels.title: Companies activity ([[repogroup]])

panels.description: Measures number of company developers active in given period. Activity is defined as: creating issue, PR, commit, comment. Self means developers working on their own.
panels.title: Companies active authors ([[repogroup]])

panels.description: Number of issues created by company developers. Self means developers working on their own.
panels.title: Issues created by company ([[repogroup]])

panels.description: Number of PRs created by company developers. Self means developers working on their own.
panels.title: PRs created by company ([[repogroup]])

panels.description: Number of commits created by company developers. Self means developers working on their own.
panels.title: Company commits ([[repogroup]])

panels.description: Number of comments written by company developers. Counts comments on Issues, PRs and reviews. Self means developers working on their own.
panels.title: Company comments ([[repogroup]])
